channel.title: [Added] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-SGJ
channel.description:
The following addition to the [IATI Organisation Identifier](http://iatistandard.org/203/codelists/IATIOrganisationIdentifier/) list has been proposed for Somali Gender Justice. The request was [reviewed by org-id.guide](https://github.com/org-id/register/issues/317) for the most appropriate identifier, and it was concluded that no alternative organisation identifier is currently available.
**Code:** XI-IATI-SGJ **Name:** Somali Gender Justice **Description:** Somali Gender Justice is a small NGO based in Garowe, Puntland, Somalia whose goal is to support gender equality, women's rights, and community transformation. **URL:** https://www.facebook.com/SomaliGenderJustice/
If no objection is received, this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.
